selected_quotes: Peru's Earth-monitoring satellite could help track natural disasters and illegal mining
Peru's first satellite, #PeruSat1, launched last night to track logging, disasters, mining
Peru is poised to launch its first Earth-observation satellite: PerúSAT-1
PerúSAT-1 is go! Peru's first satellite launched last week to track logging, disasters
And we have lift-off. Peru's first satellite launched last night to track logging, disasters

news.title: Peru Signals Space Ambitions with Earth-Monitoring Satellite
news.summary: Update: The rocket carrying PerúSAT-1 lifted off successfully from Kourou, French Guiana, at 01:43 UTC on September 16 (22:43 local time on September 15), launch operator Arianespace has announced.
